segments.text: I'm glad we live in a small town .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because the houses look so nice at Christmas time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they do . Do you have a Christmas tree this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have a big tree this year . I bought the decorations at the five-and-tencent store yesterday . Do you want to come and see it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't now because I have to buy a present for my mother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know when I can come . I'll let you know later .
segments.speaker: S2
